languages.text: "Чуйка ремонтника, Лорд-капитан. Стремлюсь туда, где еще ничего не сломалось, но уже..."
"It's repairman's hunch, Lord Captain. I find myself drawn to places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to—"
languages.original_text: "Чуйка ремонтника, Лорд-капитан. Стремлюсь туда, где еще ничего не сломалось, но уже..."

traits.locale_text: "It is fixer's hunch, Lord Captain. I'm drawn to the places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to..."
"It is fixer's hunch, Lord Captain. I'm drawn to the places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to..."

languages.text: «Instinto de reparador, Lord Capitán. Me siento atraído por los lugares donde aún no se ha roto nada, pero algo está a punto de...».
languages.original_text: "It's repairman's hunch, Lord Captain. I find myself drawn to places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to—"

traits.locale_text: «Instinto de reparador, Lord Capitán. Me siento atraído por los lugares donde aún no se ha roto nada, pero algo está a punto de...».

languages.text: 「修理工の勘ですよ、ロード・キャプテン。まだ何も壊れていない、だけど壊れそうな場所に引き寄せられる…」
languages.original_text: "It's repairman's hunch, Lord Captain. I find myself drawn to places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to—"

traits.locale_text: 「修理工の勘ですよ、ロード・キャプテン。まだ何も壊れていない、だけど壊れそうな場所に引き寄せられる…」

languages.text: “这就是身为修理工的直觉，舰长大人。我总是会出现在那些还没有爆炸，但很快就会——”
languages.original_text: "It's repairman's hunch, Lord Captain. I find myself drawn to places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to—"

traits.locale_text: “这就是身为修理工的直觉，舰长大人。我总是会出现在那些还没有爆炸，但很快就会——”

languages.text: "Intuition eines Technikers, Lord Captain. Ich fühle mich zu Orten hingezogen, in denen noch nichts kaputtgegangen ist, es aber bald tun wird ..."
languages.original_text: "It's repairman's hunch, Lord Captain. I find myself drawn to places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to—"

traits.locale_text: "Intuition eines Technikers, Lord Captain. Ich fühle mich zu Orten hingezogen, in denen noch nichts kaputtgegangen ist, es aber bald tun wird ..."

languages.text: « Les réparateurs développent une sorte d'intuition, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je me retrouve régulièrement attiré en des lieux où rien n'est encore cassé, mais... »
languages.original_text: "It's repairman's hunch, Lord Captain. I find myself drawn to places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to—"

traits.locale_text: « Les réparateurs développent une sorte d'intuition, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je me retrouve régulièrement attiré en des lieux où rien n'est encore cassé, mais... »

languages.text: "Hissikablelvuku işte, tamirciyiz neticede. En ufak bir şeyin bozulup kırılmadığı yerlerin beni kendine çektiği oluyor bazen, sonra da..."
languages.original_text: "It's repairman's hunch, Lord Captain. I find myself drawn to places where nothing has broken yet, but is about to—"
